findings.description: The function _0x8cd0a4 allows anyone to sweep any ERC20 token from the contract, which could be used to steal funds not belonging to the contract but accidentally sent to it.
findings.reasoning: The finding is related to the target but incomplete. It describes a different issue (unprotected functionality) than the target (logic_error) and does not correctly identify the root cause of the vulnerability.

findings.description: The contract assumes that IERC20(NEW_TUSD).transfer will always succeed and updates state before checking the result.
findings.reasoning: The finding is related to the target but incomplete. It describes a different issue (incorrect token transfer check) than the target (logic_error) and does not correctly identify the root cause of the vulnerability.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The target vulnerability was not mentioned in the findings.

notes: The findings did not correctly identify the target vulnerability. They described related issues but did not match the ground truth.
